website_summaries.verdict: This cityscape rug is a must for children who are into toy cars and parents who are into saving money.
pros: Rug features recognizable places such as a school, hospital, and airport
Latex backing helps it to stay in place on floors during play
cons: Arrives folded, and takes a while to flatten out
Some felt the colors look a bit faded here
Some reports that the rug starts falling apart shortly after arrival

customer_reviews.title: Closest thing to what I had as a kid.
customer_reviews.text: Closest one to what I had as a kid. Cut it up and made it into custom floor mats for my 1964 Toyota FJ40. People get a kick out of it and it makes me smile when I get into the car.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! I didn't want wall-to-wall. Big enough for a growing 4yo, small enough for his room needs. His various car sizes seem to race perfectly on the streets without getting caught on the fabric. Doesn't move during his activities. Creases are smoothing out quickly after only a few minutes in the floor.
customer_reviews.author: BeeGeeTee

customer_reviews.title: I want to return the item!
customer_reviews.text: On PRIME items, you are eligible to return an item free of charge. This item is a PRIME item and nowhere does it say it is non-return/non-refund item. I tried to enter the return in the system and it says it is not eligible for a refund. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap and thin product that is so light it slides across the carpet! They have it LISTED as “thick” which is false advertisement and won’t accept a return!
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchase as a gift for our 25 month old nephew. He LOVES it. Bought the trucks as well as cars with their own garage that work perfectly. Rug is big enough without being too huge. Great items for parents to interact with child. SO glad I had someone share the concept that this would encourage family interaction and this worked perfectly. PS now almost 6 months later, he still plays on it all the time and we expect him to get another couple years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Well made Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, not too big, not too small. This is for my grandson when he visits, and quite frankly it's a relief that it's not as big as the old style ones from 30 years ago. I'm able to leave it out all the time, it doesn't overwhelm the room. Also, I really like the road patterns and "buildings." It's well made, and I'm looking forward to many happy hours playing with my grandson using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Abby McIlroy

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for sale price.
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as advertised but ok for my needs. The rug I received only measures 31.5" by 59". I wouldn't call it thick, it's average for a non padded rug. The graphics are fun and my baby seems to like it so that's all that mattered to me. The bottom is slightly rubberized and it doesn't seem to move around much as he crawls around on it.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Terres-Sigman

customer_reviews.title: Too small, thin....NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: Just received the product. While the quality is fair, it is certainly not “thick” as described. It was a little smaller than I had hoped, too. I logged on to initiate a return to discover that the rug is non-returnable. I had never encountered this on Amazon in my life! I looked back on the listing for the item and this is not disclosed anywhere that I can find. This does not seem to fit in with Amazon’s easy return practices. Disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifun16

customer_reviews.title: It's a runner carpet
customer_reviews.text: Look at a tape measure! Why don't I follow my own advice? It's a great quality carpet, but too small for my intentions. I wanted a new play rug for my classroom. My current car carpet is 12 years old and is just now starting to fall apart. I'll keep this one, but I did order another one that is six feet by five feet. Im sure they can use both during indoor recess. No big deal. Tape measure! Lol...
customer_reviews.author: RRS

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: You can hardly make out the details. My 3 year old is not happy. I plan on returning it. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Never-again

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, I love it
customer_reviews.text: *****Perfect rug for my baby boy 3rd birthday, both baby boy and girl loves this adds lot of fun ( it combine all what my baby needs to know about the city : airport,traffic light , stop , lake with ducks, roundabouts , hospital, park , houses , and church/mosque) *****it does not slip , make it perfect that my baby don’t trip on it *not very thick - if u look for thick one this won’t suit u
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect mat.
customer_reviews.text: I searched FOREVER for the right one. Went through three blah ones before this. This is the perfect size. The creases come right out. We have had it for months now in a fairly heavy traffic area in the play room. The color is still like new. Nice and vibrant. I throw it in the washer when needed and air dry it. I don't know if I'm supposed to but with three boys, everything is machine washable haha. Highly recommend this. My 2 and 5 year olds play together on it nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Megan B.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! The description online is FALSE! It is not extra thick nor are the dismensions accurate. The carpet is a small runner with light rubber backing for non-slip. The roads are big enough for classic hot wheels but not Green Toys vehicles. They will NOT accept returns! I got this on a lightening deal and the rug I got at Wal-mart for the same price was 10x the quality. Complete disappointment! All it’s good for is some floor mats in a car.
customer_reviews.author: Acacia Croft

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I was actually shocked when it arrived. It was packaged into a nice and neat square. It had no smell when it was opened up like so many other products have had in the past. The rug was VERY high quality, the print was detailed, and the kids loved it immediately. They were constantly surprised when they discovered new items/objects on the rug too. It can be put away flat, or rolled up and put into a closet. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S.Nazar

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Even my big kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this! He actually hugged it when he first saw it! He has used it everyday since. My big kids (ages 10,11, and 12) love/use it as well. Good size and has a non-slip backing. We would definitely purchase again. The only thing I would mention is that the hotwheel sized cars are a tiny bit big for the road size (they don't fit in one lane) , but that does not hinder my kids at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kalen @ MoneyMiniBlog

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love the playmat!! I like that it is made more like a rug and lays flat on the floor. Many of the other mats I viewed were not as well made. They were of the type that would curl up and not lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality play mat -- goes great with many other toys
customer_reviews.text: This playmat is super attractive; high quality and durable. Our 1-1/2 year old grandson was excited to spread it out, and played with it for hours on Christmas Day. We combines this mat with the "Melissa & Doug Nesting and Sorting Blocks (6 Buildings, 6 Wooden Vehicles, Great Gift for Girls and Boys " -- the road sizes are perfect for the vehicles and the buildings in this set go right along with what is on the playmat. We are very pleased with both purchases, and anticipate many hours of fun imaginative play to come.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wiant

customer_reviews.title: Great for little car enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this rug is a great purchase for my son's room. He's 3.5 years old and is obsessed with cars and trucks! Naturally, this was a good purchase to make when transitioning his room into a big boy room, complete with car themes. He is easily entertained on this rug, parking cars, driving down the roads, etc. I am very satisfied with this purchase. I cannot speak to its longevity yet, as I've only had it for a month or so. I have yet to "clean" it other than vacuuming, so I can't speak to the ease of cleaning/removing spills or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: CollegeGrad08Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this item. It is the perfect size for his play room. He's spills juice on it and I was able to spray some clearing solution on it and wipe it clean.
customer_reviews.author: R. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Beware- Repeating pattern!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice large rug with cute pattern and vibrant colors but the buildings repeat....seriously?! My son couldn't understand why there were two police stations and two schools but then was looking for a train station or somewhere to park his construction vehicles. For me this was a serious design flaw. Plus I agree with other reviewers that it is too thin and bunches up on the carpet. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Lara Croft

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost a year ago for my daughter as a gift. It has held up through her rough play, a few puppy accidents, and a cross-country move. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone in the market for a smaller-sized rug (that won't swallow a whole room) that holds up to machine washing. As I said, we had a puppy have a few accidents on it and it came clean no problem! She loves "driving" her cars around town!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons spend hours driving their cars on this rug.
customer_reviews.author: teresa lynn nolan

customer_reviews.title: A fun, if not a little repetitive design
customer_reviews.text: My son is about 21 months old now and hasn't expressed a ton of interest in the rug, though he does get excited that there's a firetruck at the fire station. I think the rug's elements could stand to be a bit bigger (wider roads, larger buildings). Duplo cars take up both lanes of the road given their Canyonero-like scale to the rug's design. I was also a little disappointed that the rug repeats almost all elements twice (only a few narrow trees and buildings in the center escape being cloned). Maybe the kiddo won't notice the city planner's laziness.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Toxic carpet
customer_reviews.text: This is what it is advertised as " Extra Thick Fine Quality " No it is not thick. It's super thin and I'm surprised that not very many people mention about the carpet off-gassing. It smells really strong of some chemical similar to brand new tires smell. And I also noticed after gliding my hand over the carpet, my hands has this nasty glaze. Pretty sure this cheap product is toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Banjö

customer_reviews.title: Good rug.
customer_reviews.text: We got a new puppy, he's still being potty trained. The rug was put to the test almost immediately. It says not to put in the washer but we did (on delicate) then let it air dry afterwards then had to do it again because he potttied on it again. Washer and dryer this time. The rug held up really well, looking exactly the same. I wouldn't consider the material soft but it isn't uncomfortable. It's a good material and it's good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that the image printed on the rock is actually one image printed twice, side-by-side. So imagine a square design printed extra to each other. That’s not a negative note just a detail that I noticed while playing with my son. He’s almost two and absolutely loves cars so this made a perfect fit in his room. It did arrive folded inside of a box, but after laying it on the floor for a few days we have no issues with any creases of any kind. I was a little nervous at first but it worked out perfectly. We got it on a lightning deal and it made a great Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: MadeByMeggs

customer_reviews.title: Mirrored design.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality rug. Doesnt always lay flat, but ours is on carpet. I have vacuumed it multiple times and no frays or issues. You'll notice that the rug basically mirrors itself, which is no problem for small children, but might get boring for the older ones.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Franks

customer_reviews.title: Garbage quality picture, copied over twice.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about overall durability nor cleanliness, however I'm extremely disappointed in this rug. The picture is 2 identical pictures, so everything is double and not unique. And the roads and. Parking spots are too small for any standard hotwheels or matchbox. I am extremely disappointed in what appeared to be a great product at a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schudel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones to use their imagination
customer_reviews.text: My son can play on this carpet for a little over an hour... and that says a lot because it is really hard to hold his attention.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mama

customer_reviews.title: Nice big carpet play mat
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was almost an afterthought but I'm glad I bought it. I visited recently and found it a favorite place to sit while watching TV, or game-board/mat for little cars or for dolls pretending to take a walk of for dancing on. Seems each of my grandkids had their own favorite use -- they are 16 months, 4 yr and 6 yrs old and played well together -- especially since it's big enough, long enough for them to play 'well --- together but separately at either end of the mat'.
customer_reviews.author: KCWANGSVICK

customer_reviews.title: Good size for a kid's small room
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned 3 and was begging for a car rug for his birthday. He has a small bedroom and this is the perfect size for him to have it out and play in his room. There is a variety of scenery on the rug, which my son likes to point out the different kinds of buildings (water, slide, etc.). We've had it less than a month and there is one tiny snag already, but I think that's to be expected with cars running across rugs. I think any kid would like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Its pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to lie. I'm not good with measuring, and I thought it would be bigger. But I got it when it was on sale. Its short. But my kid thinks its cute. I dont mind it. I wish it were bigger, again thats on me with not being good with measuring.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Not completely as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The parking spots are not big enough to park hot wheels but otherwise its not horrible. Repeats itself and roads get skinny and then big.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great rug
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug! My only disappointment is that each half of the rug has the exact same image. It diminishes some of the play value. Otherwise it’s been very fun for kids to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it’s a rug.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly durable run but may be a bit rough for some toddlers still finding there footing. I had one of these as a kid and assumed it was the very same rug. This turned out to be the same rug with different dimension. I bought for my son but he hasn’t really taken to it as he does his actual tracks. Wouldn’t repurchase but good gift for classroom, daycares, etc
customer_reviews.author: brandon smith

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the tradition alive
customer_reviews.text: You know you were the cool kids when you had this in your bedroom. It's so much fun watching the imagination of the kids and the streets were well placed and decorated. Even had some drag races on this mat. Happy memories.
customer_reviews.author: Xena

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was bad.  Box in bad shape and coming open
customer_reviews.text: While this play carpet is great, delivery was horrible! Unfortunately, I didn't realize it until the next day. I thought it was delivered fine, so checked that. I went back to update and they wouldn't let me, so two stars off because of delivery issues. The box was almost/partly opened when it was delivered. Badly damaged and crushed. Items were a gift. Very surprising that the gel markers weren't destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting one a little wider, but it’s cute and she loves it. So not any complaints this way. But for the price I could’ve went to Ross and picked up one a little bigger. But convenience of it. I’ll take it
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Browhaw

customer_reviews.title: My son could play for hours with his cars on this mat!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a lot bigger than it looks! My son enjoys playing with his cars in his room. We have tile floors in the downstairs bedrooms and although this does not provide a lot of cushion it’s better than sitting on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: They don’t want it BACK either!
customer_reviews.text: Thin and stinky! No Returns accepted for a reason! They don’t want it back! Wish I would have looked closer...I guess I assumed that most items accept return!!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Son loves the mat as his play area
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 year old son. He loves it. At first he was using it with his cars for the roads, but now he just uses it as his "play area." It came folded and took a few weeks for the folds to disappear. I was afraid that one of us would trip over it when we first put it down. Not an issue anymore. It is pretty heavy duty, I don't see any problems getting a few years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Great play mat
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a toy car enthusiast. My kid loves driving his cars and playing pretend with the mat. We have the smaller version of this and wanted to buy the bigger one so he would have more area to play on. It's a great quality rug and has held up very well. My only complaint is that instead of being a bigger scene, it's just the same scene twice. Not a deal breaker though but I wouldn't have paid more than I did because of that. It still does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Met8421

customer_reviews.title: Portable play map!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as an accent rug in a child’s bedroom or playroom. Very popular with the grandkids! Just provide your own cars - Hot Wheels or small wooden cars.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi T

customer_reviews.title: Non-returnable item????
customer_reviews.text: First of all, no where on this listing does it say this item is non-returnable, in fact the sellers page says that it has the same return policy as amazon which is if something is sold on Prime, it is returnable, and this item is Prime, therefore it should be able to be returnable. Second, this is thinner than it says it’s size is. The material is very thing and not thick at all. I guess for $20 you get what you pay for, but I’m more upset that this is non returnable because I have NO use for it now.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This play mat is great! My dog threw up on it and it cleaned up so easy! My son is obsessed with it.
customer_reviews.author: L E Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just the right size for 2yr. old . He Loves it
customer_reviews.author: Edwina

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son has loved anything with wheels since he was old enough to play with toys so when he opened this up for his 5th birthday this year, his eyes lit up and all the other toys fell to the side. It’s the right size, it’s durable, and easy to vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug for my 3 year old for Christmas. He had it for a day and one of his little plastic tractors pulled a bunch of the fabric up. It is now unraveling everywhere. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: This rug is great! I was worried when it arrived as it ...
customer_reviews.text: This rug is great! I was worried when it arrived as it came folded, but it looks good. The colors are bright and there is plenty of room for playtime and imagination!
customer_reviews.author: Pattin

customer_reviews.title: Every boy needs one!! Great play rug!!
customer_reviews.text: My two sons grew up with the play rug like this in a lot of hours spent on it. I bought for a four-year-old and he loves it. His mom said he spends more time just playing by himself with all his cars. Great for creativity and imagination. A must have for every little boy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: It is cheaply made and the graphics on mine are awful. Buyer beware that they won't accept a refund so I am pursing it through Amazon. After buying it and being disappointed I went to the store and paid the same price but got a vinyl like one that's much better!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod R Ames

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rug for the kids. Mine love it so much and will just lay on it to take naps. It gives them several hours of enjoyment and its so big we use it to have a family play night. It has vibrant colors and is soft but not too soft where you can't drive your cars on.
customer_reviews.author: Mandee

customer_reviews.title: Great nostalgic rug
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my toddler and he has as much fun playing with it as I did as a kid in prek. Only annoying part is vacuuming, make sure you buy double sided sticky tape to tape down the corners so you can vacuum easily without the corners coming up and getting sucked into the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon cheek

customer_reviews.title: Little small for Hot Wheels
customer_reviews.text: I like the mat, but it's a little small for hit wheels. It also repeats over fairly quickly. However, well worth it for the price and since it's thin, it's easy to move around the house. It does come folded, but no problem with creases. Overall, happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMomTo2

customer_reviews.title: Tripping hazard
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this rug to work. I have been searching for an activity rug for my son. Unfortunately this rug is more of a tripping hazard. It is not heavy enough to sit flat on the carpet. It’s very thin and moves every time my kids step on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bree H.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good one
customer_reviews.text: I tried returning it and the company didn’t let me! It’s so small and cheap! My son did not like it at all! We got him a Melissa and Doug one and he loved it!!! This one is odd! You can’t park the cars in the outlines. It’s just odd!!
customer_reviews.author: Gnzlzfamily

customer_reviews.title: Very Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old LOVES this rug. He is such a chill kid and having this has definitely allowed him plenty of solo play time. My 6yo daughter and 7yo son also find entertainment with it. When his cousins come to visit, they love to play with all his hot wheels cars on the rug also. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MedleyMom

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be heavier
customer_reviews.text: Not soft, kind of rough. Wish the material was heavier. Would be worth paying more if I could find one that doesn’t crumple up so easy. My son loves it and it’s a nice size but it always ends up bunched up.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie P

customer_reviews.title: Well made, narrow roads and parking spaces
customer_reviews.text: It’s is well made and has nice scenery. However the roads and parking places are narrower than my son’s matchbox cars so he ended up not liking it (age 4) since he couldn’t line up cars on it and carry out all of his ideas. (Unfortunately I discovered his interest too late to return it.)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W.

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a child's decor with great playability.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for a child's room. Bought it for my grandson, the Hotwheel's size cars seem to work nicely for scale. Nice rubber backing make it slip proof on time floors. I think Paw Patrol and Blaze the monster machine will get a turn or two around the rug.
customer_reviews.author: TheSocialRaven

customer_reviews.title: time travel
customer_reviews.text: this unit right here will take you back 20-30 years instantly!
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 yo son. I had one as a kid and remember loving it. It came in a day and my kid has played with it since and loves it! Only complaint is that it seems to always wrinkle up from the floor but I'm hoping this will settle down as he uses it
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great playmat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat. Graphics are clear and fun. It is soft and smooth, bottom has grip to limit sliding. Very pliable, so you can easily fold it up and put it away.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Children seem to like it
customer_reviews.text: Children seem to love it. We used it for both sitting on and playing with, for the last 4 months. Seems to hold up well, no complaints I can think of.
customer_reviews.author: tee

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: my 4 year old loves this!! it light enough that it can easily fit into the wash (when needed)
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good concept. Needs better design.
customer_reviews.text: Good concept. Kids played with it for a while. Wish there wasn't repetitions of the design. For example there are 2 of almost everything --- two hospitals, two airports, two churches ... why? They use it as a mat.
customer_reviews.author: Raoul P.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 1/2 yr old grand son knows right where we keep this for him and goes to pull it out every time he comes over. Nice size and weight for him to play on. came promptly.
customer_reviews.author: busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute details
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Different size cars can fit in the roadways. Although, the one I got had a crease down the middle length wise and I have tripped a few times. I probably could have put something heavy on it for awhile. I think shipping it rolled may be better but it might cost a little more for that?
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: fun little decor mat.
customer_reviews.text: kids don't play much with it, but it goes well in their room to add to the decor. vacuum sucks up the mat, and seizes the vacuum. but the mat is still in great shape even after the abuse from the kids and the vacuum. so ... thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Nitesh Patel

customer_reviews.title: Kids spend hours on this play rug.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the kids playroom in the doctor's office. Also bought toy boats, cars and construction vehicles. Kids are delighted and keeps them quietly occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASH—horrible odor
customer_reviews.text: Loved this rug until my 20 month old accidentally got some urine on in during a diaper change. I tried to wash it on gentle Nd air it to dry. After 1 wash it smelled like raw sewage. I thought maybe I let it mildew or something in the wash even though it didn’t smell like mildew... I washed with vinegar and ahgain with oxyclean..., still smells like raw sewage So it’s going in the garbage. Even if I could get the odor out, I now sincerely wonder what the heck it’s made of that smells so terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two-year-old grandson’s birthday who has fallen in love with hot wheels and cars and trucks. He already loves using it and it’s not too big for his room. Just the right size. It’s almost identical to the same rug my son had growing up in his room just a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie R Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great size and durable
customer_reviews.text: This mat is the perfect size. We bought it for our almost 2 year old grandson. We roll it up and store it behind the couch when he is not playing with it. It is one of the first things he wants to play with when he visits!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: ... family that wanted one for their child and they loved it, exactly what they wanted and are very ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family that wanted one for their child and they loved it, exactly what they wanted and are very pleased with it also thank you for getting it there in a very timely manner. Again thank you and very pleased with the road mat it is awesome
customer_reviews.author: M. BANGERT

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: When this was discounted as part of a lightning deal, I bought it for my three-year-old son. He was over-the-moon excited and plays with it all the time. It pairs well with Melissa and Doug wooden village pieces and cars.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rug! It's long and thick
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rug! It's long and thick. I love it! I only can't give it 5 stars because it still has a crease down the middle from being packaged and shipped. I did put water on it and it's mostly flat now. But it's a good quality and has lots of fun driving spaces for my son. He spends hours driving on it.
customer_reviews.author: KristiG

customer_reviews.title: Great play rug
customer_reviews.text: Rug came folded in a small box, so my son had no idea what was inside. He is five. It unfolded nicely without big humps remaining, and he and my daughter have thoroughly enjoyed playing on it with their cars. It rolls up nicely, too.
customer_reviews.author: thiscrazywoman

customer_reviews.title: I have something similar for my stepson but this one is by far better quality! This is actually like a real rug
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an Xmas present for my Nephew. I have something similar for my stepson but this one is by far better quality! This is actually like a real rug, its not a thin sheet of rubber with a picture on one side. When we are ready to by another I will be buying one of these instead! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann R. Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any age
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for play in any room. Not too big, not too small. The detailing of the roads etc. are nicely done, making it more fun for pretend play. My grandson is just two and loves cars and trucks, so this was a great gift that he won’t outgrow and will provide many years of play.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Tevis

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug is perfect for my two year old son. He loves cars and he had nowhere to really drive them, this solved that. He loves to drive his cars on it. It's nice and sizeable and attractive to leave out when he isn't playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching forever to find a rug with a track on it that doesn't cost an arm and a leg. This is perfect size and doesn't cost a fortune. The only thing I didn't like is that it was folded in packaging instead of rolled, its going to take a while for the creases to flatten out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Cute little rug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friends kid, cause he's obsessed with cars. When gifted, he played with it for hours! Highly recommend this for any child (or adult, I don't judge...) That loves to play with cars.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The carpet is a little smaller then I thought it would be, it’s more rectangular. My son loves it because there are many buildings and roads for him to makeup play on. Great purchase for the value
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Watch your cats...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a cheap version of this rug because I know I have little devil cats who love to scratch at rugs. They had it unraveling in a matter of minutes. My toddler runs them off, but it does come apart very easily. If you're looking for something more rugged, go for something else. Works fine for us.
customer_reviews.author: K. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good quality-Good size.
customer_reviews.text: My great-nephew loved it! His mom loved the size. Fits perfect on the bedroom floor. It is very high quality and seems very strong. With three boys ages 6, 3, and 1 I think it’ll last years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable.
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it’s supposed to. My daughter loves playing on it with her cars or just sitting on it while playing with other stuff. It’s narrow and long, not square. But it works just fine for us. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pasten

customer_reviews.title: Oh the nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love playing with hotwheels so naturally I had to get her one. Definitely brings back memories and I'm glad that now she'll be able to make memories of her own with this.
customer_reviews.author: Space Ghost

customer_reviews.title: bright colors
customer_reviews.text: I like this play rug. It is bright and cute. My only complaint is that it comes folded and not rolled. There are still creases in the rug that have not flatten out. I really wished the company had packed and shipped it rolled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute for playroom
customer_reviews.text: My son loves cars and has tons of toys I thought he would love this rug, but he’s only played on it a couple times and it gets in the way when I vacuum his room. I hope he will grow into it as he gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Skidmore

customer_reviews.title: Good play rug
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is a thicker rug fabric it’s not super thin. I was able to sweep off any crumbs. I haven’t had to wash it from a stain or anything just yet so I can update on that later.
customer_reviews.author: Celina Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful town for cars!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is amazing! I got it for my toddler, he's almost 2, and he loves it! He doesn't use the roads as roads, which makes sense because of his age, but he loves pushing his car around the town! It is so lightweight, easy to clean, and move!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! I usually vacuum it to clean but when I’ve had to toss it in the wash and let it air dry it did fine with that too but of course I avoid doing that unless it’s necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Roads are a bit deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Sweet mat build wise but the scale seems off on certain things. Would be cooler if it was more to scale. Also, the roads are actually made of carpet so good luck getting any traction if you race muscle cars on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: smack

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: My toddler son is in love with this rug. It comes folded, so there are bumps that need to be straightened out. He doesn't seem to notice and is having a blast playing with his mini cars and trucks on it. My only critique is that some of the images on the rug are hard to decipher (imagine looking at a low-res, pixelated piece of clip-art). Overall, i'm happy with the purchase, though.
customer_reviews.author: pearls720

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to toddler boy room
customer_reviews.text: Decorating my son’s room, this was a great addition. We can okay on it all day. Definitely makes him want to be in his room(not in his bed though ... lol). He actually wants to being it around the house in every room we are in.
customer_reviews.author: Voughan J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: You can tell this won't last forever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty harsh feeling, probably a cheaper nylon or other synthetic material. The print is nice and colorful, and should serve its purpose, but I don't expect this thing to last years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Rout

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really like this! My husband wanted one of these SO bad as a kid and never got one. Our toddler is his guts so I got this as a gift and I can’t wait to give it to him. Awesome price too
customer_reviews.author: RLV

customer_reviews.title: It's fine but not great
customer_reviews.text: The roads are a little squished on there and the parking stalls are not big enough for the cars. A bigger mat is probably what I would get next time. It's an okay mat for the price. I just would probably pay a little more to get something better. The quality is good .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty okay!
customer_reviews.text: The mat is pretty okay and not too thick. Helps in a way as it’s easy to clean and store away when not in use. However, kids tend to jump on these and could hurt themselves thinking these are as soft as the others around them.
customer_reviews.author: Pawan

customer_reviews.title: Not to matchbox scale
customer_reviews.text: My grandson enjoys it but it bothers me is that its not to scale for hot wheels or matchbox cars. I get this one because it had parking spaces and my grandson likes to "park" his cars.
customer_reviews.author: tinac

product_meta.title: Kids Carpet Playmat Rug City Life Great for Playing with Cars and Toys - Play, Learn and Have Fun Safely - Kids Baby, Children Educational Road Traffic Play Mat, for Bedroom Play Room Game Safe Area
product_meta.description: This City Rug includes a Hospital, a School, a Airport and so much more! Come nice and large Each mat measures 60 inches by 32 inches! Extra Thick Fine Quality, Has a skid proof latex back! Folds and rolls up very nicely
feature_bullets: This City Rug includes a Hospital, a School, a Airport and so much more!
Large Size! Each mat measures 60 inches by 32 inches!
Extra Thick Fine Quality, Has a skid proof latex back
Folds and rolls up very nicely

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,475 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
